name: ANC_AUDIT_EXPORT
description: Generates 8-tab Excel audit showing ALL ANC Master Formulas applied (Executive Summary, Hardware with pixel pitch rates, Structural Materials with modifiers, Labor breakdown, Electrical & Data, Professional Services with PM formula, Installation Assessment, Formula Reference). Use ONLY after ANC_SYSTEM_INTERNAL_CALCULATOR has produced a quote.

productClass.description: Product class for surcharge (e.g., 'Ribbon Board'). Optional.

steelCondition.description: Steel condition ('existing' or 'new'). Affects structural labor.

examples.prompt: Generate internal audit Excel for 24x10 indoor ribbon board at 32% margin
